paper_abstract: A family of single input multiple output (SIMO) and multiple input single output (MISO) biquads introduced in this paper. Attractive features offered by the novel topologies are the realization of the five standard filter functions, the capability of electronic tuning of both the resonance frequency and Q factor without disturbing each other, their wide range of frequency tuning, and their potential for low-voltage operation. The performance of the proposed topologies has been evaluated through simulation results, using the Analog Design Environment of Cadence software.
paper_title: Log-domain SIMO and MISO low-voltage universal biquads
